title: Nancy Pelosi Teases Decision About Her Future in Congress
description: The House speaker would not say how the assault on her husband had affected her thinking about whether to stay in Congress. But she said it underscored how Republicans are determined to “put a stop to me.”
dc:creator: Annie Karni
media:description: Speaker Nancy Pelosi at her home in San Francisco last week. In an interview on Monday, she appeared visibly shaken as she spoke of the attack and the “long haul” recovery process her husband faced.
